-- Switchblade --

Switchblade smiles, "Ahh yes, Perceptor. I see that you have come 
back to use." His dark green had scratches his chin slowly, as he 
observes the bot's new addition, an infrared visor that would help 
Perceptor "see" in a fashion. His eyes flash, then he turns back to 
the control panel, remembering the damaged that he had to 
fix... "Perceptor, I need you to watch the scanners. They are in 
passive mode at the moment, cause we're trying not to attract 
attention. I've got the fix this mess..." He trails off, as he 
glances at the mess of wires that was once an intact control panel. 

Tiny compartments on his left and right arms open up, and his twin 
laser welders pop out into his hands. He proceeds to repair the 
damaged done to the control panel.
 

> Perceptor woke up and said "What happened... Master Swichblade ??"
